name: Little Planet (Loann Courcoul, Samuel Barbeau, Arysae, Tiimot, Oste)
name_original: Little Planet (Loann Courcoul, Samuel Barbeau, Arysae, Tiimot, Oste)
description:
An astronaut crashed on a planet as his ship exploded in mid-flight into space. He must search for the parts of his space ship that crashed on this planet in order to repair it. This project was made in 8 weeks on Unity for our school 2nd year final project. Producer and developer : Loann Courcoul Lead Dev (inventory + craft) : Samuel Barbeau Lead Graph : Marie Varin / @ArysaeMarie Lead Tech : Guillaume Lebourque Rigging and Animations : Johan Jolivet SpaceShip Modelisation : Dylan Dousset Game Design and UI : Oskar Blandin Player Movement and Gravity : Timothé Rondeau Random Events : Lucie Fribault Controls :
KeyboardMoveZQD or Arrow Keys / Space to Jump / Left Shift to Sprint
Interact
EInventoryIUse Item
Left Click
FlashLightRight Click
PauseEscape
